Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Comfort Inn London - Westminster, you'll be centrally located in London, convenient to Westminster Cathedral and Buckingham Palace. This family-friendly hotel is close to Big Ben and Harrods.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 54 guestrooms. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities such as wireless Internet access (surcharge), concierge services, and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
A complimentary breakfast is included.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, a 24-hour front desk, and multilingual staff. A roundtrip airport shuttle is available for a surcharge.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 11 AM
A complimentary breakfast is included.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.

With a stay at Comfort Inn London - Westminster, you'll be centrally located in London, convenient to Westminster Cathedral and Buckingham Palace. This family-friendly hotel is close to Big Ben and Harrods.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Westminster Cathedral - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Apollo Victoria Theatre - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Victoria Palace Theatre - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Tate Britain - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi
Vauxhall Bridge - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Royal Mews - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Queen's Gallery - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Chelsea Bridge - 1 km / 0.6 mi
St. James Park - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Lambeth Bridge - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
Buckingham Palace - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Queen Elizabeth II Conference Centre - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Victoria Tower - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Sloane Square - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Houses of Parliament - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi

The nearest airports are:
London (LCY-London City) - 13.1 km / 8.2 mi
London (LHR-Heathrow) - 21.6 km / 13.4 mi

The preferred airport for Comfort Inn London - Westminster is London (LHR-Heathrow).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The closest major airports to Central House Hotel Victoria are:
London (LCY-London City) - 13.2 km / 8.2 mi
London (LHR-Heathrow) - 21.6 km / 13.4 mi
London (LGW-Gatwick) - 37.3 km / 23.2 mi

The preferred airport for Central House Hotel Victoria is London (LHR-Heathrow).

Message.Text:
Essential Information:
Please note: From 18th September until 10th of October 2017 our breakfast area will be closed for refurbishment. During this time the hotel will serve packed breakfast to each guest. The breakfast will contain White or brown roll, yogurt, crackers, muffins, juice, cheese sticks, butter, jam portion. Applicable from 01/Jan/0001 to 31/Dec/9999

No amendments or name changes can be made to this booking once it is confirmed.
